snippet.title: Elements Cubed Beta CO-OP Gameplay!
snippet.description:
We figured the public needed some active footage of E3's CO-OP Mode, so here it is!

Elements Cubed is a fast pace bullet hell game where you REK Computer Viruses!

Run, Dive, and Dodge through perilous enemy fire and retaliate using an assortment of digital spells & abilities!

Go it alone, or play it with a friend in couch CO-OP Mayhem!

LINK TO THE DEMO:
https://gamejolt.com/games/ElementsCu...

OUR WEBSITE:
http://www.baconstudio.com

SOCIALS:
Discord Server: https://discord.gg/WvBKjamncK
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bacon_studio
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/baconstudio​
YouTube: https://bit.ly/BaconStudioYouTube​
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Bacon_Studio_
